channel.title: Italy on Nep Gear
channel.description: Recent content in Italy on Nep Gear

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description:
Hi, in this blog I will post some interesting things that I learn in my travels and studies around the world with special focus in my two favorities contries Japan and Italy.

I mostly post in english but you will observe that I still need to improve my grammar skills. Somethimes I post in Spanish and in the future maybe I will also post in Italian or Japanese :)

Topics that I will post are related to:

  • Languages
  • Turism
  • Robotic engenieering
  • Programming
  • Anime and Videogames
